# Maple code for computing the reduced lexicographic Groebner basis of the set of polynomial equations eqX.

restart:
with(LinearAlgebra):
with(Groebner):
eqX := [283657519708*c1*c2*c3/499999128417 - 283657519708*c1*s2*s3/499999128417 - 78222207545*c2*c3*s1/499999128417 - 404250944560*c2*s3/499999128417 - 404250944560*c3*s2/499999128417 + c4*c5*c6 - 199999*c6*s4*s5/19999800001 + 78222207545*s1*s2*s3/499999128417 - 19999800000*s4*s6/19999800001, 283398557905*c1*c2*c3/499999128417 - 283398557905*c1*s2*s3/499999128417 - 319026752708*c2*c3*s1/499999128417 + 260588405060*c2*s3/499999128417 + 260588405060*c3*s2/499999128417 - c4*c5*s6 - 19999800000*c6*s4/19999800001 + 319026752708*s1*s2*s3/499999128417 + 199999*s4*s5*s6/19999800001, -298701853540*c1*c2*c3/499999128417 + 298701853540*c1*s2*s3/499999128417 - 376964647840*c2*c3*s1/499999128417 - 136652791367*c2*s3/499999128417 - 136652791367*c3*s2/499999128417 - c4*s5 - 199999*c5*s4/19999800001 + 376964647840*s1*s2*s3/499999128417, -10279*c1*c2*c3/20000 + 10279*c1*s2*s3/20000 - 47349*c2*c3*s1/50000 + 3*c2*c3/20 + 19171*c2*s3/25000 + 19171*c3*s2/25000 + 307*c3/500 + 3*c4*c5/100 - c4*s5/5 - 199999*c5*s4/99999000005 + 47349*s1*s2*s3/50000 - 3*s2*s3/20 - 599997*s4*s5/1999980000100 + 1/5, 78222207545*c1/499999128417 + 199999*c4*c6*s5/19999800001 + 19999800000*c4*s6/19999800001 + c5*c6*s4 + 283657519708*s1/499999128417, 319026752708*c1/499999128417 + 19999800000*c4*c6/19999800001 - 199999*c4*s5*s6/19999800001 - c5*s4*s6 + 283398557905*s1/499999128417, 376964647840*c1/499999128417 + 199999*c4*c5/19999800001 - 298701853540*s1/499999128417 - s4*s5, 47349*c1/50000 + 199999*c4*c5/99999000005 + 599997*c4*s5/1999980000100 + 3*c5*s4/100 - 10279*s1/20000 - s4*s5/5, -283657519708*c1*c2*s3/499999128417 - 283657519708*c1*c3*s2/499999128417 - 404250944560*c2*c3/499999128417 + 78222207545*c2*s1*s3/499999128417 + 78222207545*c3*s1*s2/499999128417 + 19999800000*c6*s5/19999800001 + 404250944560*s2*s3/499999128417 - 199999*s6/19999800001, -283398557905*c1*c2*s3/499999128417 - 283398557905*c1*c3*s2/499999128417 + 260588405060*c2*c3/499999128417 + 319026752708*c2*s1*s3/499999128417 + 319026752708*c3*s1*s2/499999128417 - 199999*c6/19999800001 - 260588405060*s2*s3/499999128417 - 19999800000*s5*s6/19999800001, 298701853540*c1*c2*s3/499999128417 + 298701853540*c1*c3*s2/499999128417 - 136652791367*c2*c3/499999128417 + 376964647840*c2*s1*s3/499999128417 + 376964647840*c3*s1*s2/499999128417 + 19999800000*c5/19999800001 + 136652791367*s2*s3/499999128417, 10279*c1*c2*s3/20000 + 10279*c1*c3*s2/20000 + 19171*c2*c3/25000 + 47349*c2*s1*s3/50000 - 3*c2*s3/20 + 47349*c3*s1*s2/50000 - 3*c3*s2/20 + 3999960000*c5/19999800001 - 19171*s2*s3/25000 - 307*s3/500 + 599994000*s5/19999800001 + 16/25, c1**2 + s1**2 - 1, c2**2 + s2**2 - 1, c3**2 + s3**2 - 1, c4**2 + s4**2 - 1, c5**2 + s5**2 - 1, c6**2 + s6**2 - 1];
vr := [c1,s1,c2,s2,c3,s3,c4,s4,c5,s5,c6,s6];
mo := plex(op(vr));
B := Basis(eqX, mo):
for i to nops(B) do
    B[i] := evalf[20](B[i]/LeadingCoefficient(B[i], mo));
end do;
fd := open("gb.txt",WRITE):
fprintf(fd,convert(B,string)):
close(fd):
quit;
